name: project-starter
description: Tools for starting and managing project sessions - intelligently loads project context, analyzes TODOs, proposes next steps

hooks.prompt: If features.json was edited and a feature was marked as 'done' with 'passes: true', SUGGEST (do not auto-commit) a checkpoint commit to the user with message format: 'feat(FEAT-XXX): [description]'. Ask user if they want to commit now. Only suggest if the edited file was features.json and a feature status changed to done.
